wikipedia_page.main: Patience Jane Wheatcroft, Baroness Wheatcroft (born 28 September 1951) 37 (70)The Wall Street Journal Europe. She left this role upon becoming a peer.She previously served as editor of The Sunday Telegraph newspaper. She resigned from this post in September 2007 after eighteen months in the job and temporarily moved out of journalism.
